title: Patcher Won't Even Open

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: So, after having issues yesterday I reinstalled league and when I come on the next day to play, I get this error message when I try to open the patcher. Please help. Thank you.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try [completely reinstalling league of legends](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends).
Already did it. It works again.
